lead_paragraph: All eyes will be on San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick at a Thursday night football game to see if he will sit again during the U.S. national anthem to protest racial injustice in the United States.

headline.print_headline: Eyes on NFL's Kaepernick in San Diego Amid Anthem Protest
headline.main: Eyes on NFL's Kaepernick in San Diego Amid Anthem Protest
